# deployContractDeterministicRaw() function

Deploy a contract at a deterministic address, using Create2 method Address depends on the Create2 factory address.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function deployContractDeterministicRaw(
  signer: Signer,
  bytecode: string,
  encodedArgs: BytesLike,
  create2FactoryAddress: string,
  options?: DeployOptions,
  predictedAddress?: string,
  gasLimit?: number,
): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter             | Type                                    | Description  |
| --------------------- | --------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| signer                | Signer                                  |              |
| bytecode              | string                                  |              |
| encodedArgs           | BytesLike                               |              |
| create2FactoryAddress | string                                  |              |
| options               | [DeployOptions](./sdk.deployoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |
| predictedAddress      | string                                  | _(Optional)_ |
| gasLimit              | number                                  | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
